## PHQ-9 vs SURPS

Researchers and psychologists who need to compare the PHQ-9 with SURPS often face challenges due to the time-consuming and subjective nature of questionnaire item harmonisation. Thankfully, Harmony, an innovative tool using natural language processing and AI, streamlines this process efficiently. The comparison of PHQ-9 vs SURPS can be performed quickly and objectively, offering reliable matches between them. With Harmony's database, you can directly select and compare the instruments like PHQ-9 vs SURPS. You can even use your own questionnaire items with Harmony simply by dragging and dropping the PDF into their web interface. This makes your job of harmonising items across different languages and formats a lot easier and less taxing. By using Harmony for comparing PHQ-9 vs SURPS, psychologists can extensively utilise cohort and longitudinal studies. This helps tremendously in understanding the impact of changing social conditions on test results. Embrace Harmony for a seamless, quick and reliable harmonisation of questionnaire items.

## Compare the items in PHQ-9 and SURPS

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import PHQ-9 and SURPS into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just PHQ-9 into Harmony</a> - compare PHQ-9 with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just SURPS into Harmony</a> - compare SURPS with other instruments
